title: How to Connect my Brothers Together - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Reincarnated in a Game World   Roommates   Siblings   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Transmigration
author: 시야
description: One day, I suddenly fell into a BL novel. How did I became the main character’s younger sister in one day?! “If you connect the two main characters together, you will be able to get out of this place!” What? These two men who were homosexuals are acting strange.>
